code: import AsyncStorage from"react-native-web/dist/exports/AsyncStorage";import{types,getRoot}from'mobx-state-tree';import{persist}from'mst-persist';export var ViewStore=types.model('ViewStore',{view:types.optional(types.number,1)}).views(function(self){return{get viewStore(){return self.view;}};}).actions(function(self){return{setView:function setView(view){self.view=view;},getView:function getView(){}};});var viewStore=ViewStore.create({});persist('ViewStore',viewStore,{storage:AsyncStorage,jsonify:true});export default viewStore;
